segments.text: I'm staring at this kitchen, and suddenly I spot the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's on, water flooding out—how did that happen?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying a plate, totally unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the water; she'll slip any minute!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turning my gaze left, there's a boy on a stool reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's open— they're raiding it!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tipping back; oh god, he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up too, like she's in on the secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such mischief in such a calm setting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks serene, totally opposite.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end badly with the wet floor and all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who left the water running? That's the real shock.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything seems so ordinary until you look closer.
segments.speaker: PAR
